mas: We believe that technology has the potential to transform everyday life in Africa, for the better. We built Jumia to help consumers access millions of goods and services conveniently and at the best prices while opening up a new way for sellers to reach consumers and grow their businesses.
jm: Jumia delivers innovative, convenient and affordable online services to consumers in Africa that help them fulfil their everyday needs.
jta: Jumia takes African economies online, helping small and large businesses grow and reach new consumers, empowering a new generation to build their lives and make their communities better.
